name: Last Dance (itch)
description:
Last Dance is a 2D adventure game created in 48-hour for GAMEHIGHED Jam. 

Last Dance is a game about a terribly sick patience. He is sure that he is going to die soon and he wants to strike all the items on his bucket list. Game starts at one of his visits to hospital but this time it is the last visit. He has only one more week to live. 

############
